alert.note: Alert for Clay; Kanawha; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kanawha, southwestern Roane and southwestern Clay Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charleston, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, South Charleston, Dunbar, Sissonville, Clendenin, Pinch, Coal Fork, Elkview, Amma, Glen and Left Hand. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 27. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 116. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 53 and 57. Route 119 between mile markers 76 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
